Sentencas: Composition of (40-x)SrO-(x)BaO-45SiO(2)-10B(2)O(3)-5ZrO(2) (x=0,10,20,30 and 40 mol%) are synthesized by melt quench technique.
Titulo: Mixed alkaline earth modifiers effect on thermal, optical and structural properties of SrO-BaO-SiO2-B2O3-ZrO2 glass sealants

Sentencas: The as prepared samples are characterized using various experimental techniques to study their structural, optical (insulating) and thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) to check their suitability as glass sealants.
Titulo: Mixed alkaline earth modifiers effect on thermal, optical and structural properties of SrO-BaO-SiO2-B2O3-ZrO2 glass sealants

Sentencas: Alkaline earth mixed modifier effect is observed on all the properties.
Titulo: Mixed alkaline earth modifiers effect on thermal, optical and structural properties of SrO-BaO-SiO2-B2O3-ZrO2 glass sealants

Sentencas: However, it is more pronounced when SrO/BaO modifiers ratio is approached to 1 in the present glasses.
Titulo: Mixed alkaline earth modifiers effect on thermal, optical and structural properties of SrO-BaO-SiO2-B2O3-ZrO2 glass sealants

Sentencas: All glasses exhibit optical band gap in moderate insulating range viz.
Titulo: Mixed alkaline earth modifiers effect on thermal, optical and structural properties of SrO-BaO-SiO2-B2O3-ZrO2 glass sealants

Sentencas: 3.2-3.8eV. TEC of as prepared glasses is also in required range of SOFC sealants except glass having x=20 mol% (SB-20).
Titulo: Mixed alkaline earth modifiers effect on thermal, optical and structural properties of SrO-BaO-SiO2-B2O3-ZrO2 glass sealants

Sentencas: Softening temperature of all the glasses is higher than 700 degrees C except this glass.
Titulo: Mixed alkaline earth modifiers effect on thermal, optical and structural properties of SrO-BaO-SiO2-B2O3-ZrO2 glass sealants

Sentencas: Based on present study, glass having x=10 mol% (SB-10) could be suitable as a sealant for intermediate temperature (600-800 degrees C) solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Mixed alkaline earth modifiers effect on thermal, optical and structural properties of SrO-BaO-SiO2-B2O3-ZrO2 glass sealants
